item.title: A Blueprint to Consistently Create Passive Income
item.description: Passive income is an income stream derived from an investment that requires little to no work to maintain. Itâ€™s a great way to diversify your income and pursue financial freedom. Here you will find a series of steps to create your very own passive income system. Create a Plan Set a realistic but also ambitious goal for yourself. Then create a list of steps to get there. Figure out how much you need to save, where you can invest, and what kind of returns you need to meet your goal.
